newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan real estate shares down, await land plans.
newsitem.headline: Japan real estate shares down, await land plans.

text.p: Shares in the Japanese real estate sector 0#REA.T were mostly lower in Monday morning trade, as the market waited for the government to formally announce plans to improve land liquidity later in the day, brokers said.
"The plans have mostly been factored into the market and should not provide much support," a broker at a second-tier brokerage said.
By 0106 GMT, shares of Mitsui Fudosan Co Ltd's had fallen 40 yen to 1,280, Mitsubishi Estate Co Ltd 20 yen to 1,380, and Tokyu Land Corp 10 yen to 406.
